abstract: The Pittsburgh-Arizona game was just another showcase of Ben Roethlisberger's uncanny ability to extend plays.
snippet: The Pittsburgh-Arizona game was just another showcase of Ben Roethlisberger's uncanny ability to extend plays.
lead_paragraph: A closer look at some of the matchups in Week 7, with the benefit of film review:

headline.main: Week 7 Film Review: Roethlisberger Buys Time
